tonight. God wants just so much just to embrace
you, to forgive you, to wrap his arms around

you, and to throw a celebration for you. The

3170.text:
Getting your affairs in order begins with
the invitation I'm going to give right now.

3179.text:
God, we're so grateful that you've opened
that door. The only door to salvation is in

3189.text:
the shadow of the cross of Jesus Christ, and
no man comes to the Father except through

3195.text:
him. Speak to hearts now, Lord. I pray with
my brothers and sisters for anyone here tonight

3203.text:
struggling with that decision, unsure of their
final destination, not really knowing what

3211.text:
lies ahead and not comfortable with a wait-and-see
attitude. I pray that wisdom would be reflected

3217.text:
in a decision to accept the gift of Jesus
Christ right now. And if that's you, God is

3224.text:
speaking to your heart, your palms maybe sweaty
and your heart beating, but I want you to

3228.text:
raise that hand and say, "Pray for me, Chip.
I want to accept Christ right now." Who will

3234.text:
take that step? God bless you. There are more.
And you. Praise the Lord.

The Holy Spirit is speaking to hearts. Don't
miss this opportunity. You cannot afford to

get this one wrong. Let the love of Christ
be shed abroad in your heart. It's over. It's

finished. He has accomplished it. You don't
have to earn it. You don't have to do anything

3265.text:
except accept it. It's such a marvelous gift.
In the back, I see your hand back there. Anybody

3271.text:

3281.text:
too can make is step to accept Christ right

3287.text:
You can have a definite promise, a guarantee

3292.text:
up, just stand up right now. I'm going to
pray for you. Anybody who raised your hand,

just stand up where you're at. Don't worry

3299.text:
God bless you. Stand up; we're going to pray
for you. Anybody else? Balcony? Thank you,

3306.text:
Lord. This is what we call the "great confession,"
the belief in Christ and his promises to forgive

3314.text:
and to save. Let's all repeat after me and
pray together with these. Lord Jesus, I believe

3322.text:
that you died for our sins, and that you are
the Son of God. I believe your blood cleanses

3331.text:
me from all sin. Forgive me. Help me to love
you and to serve you all the days of my life.

3342.text:
Holy Spirit, come into my life and empower

3355.text:
Closing: What binds us together is devotion
to worshiping our heavenly Father, dedication

3361.text:

proclaim our eternal hope in Jesus Christ.
